title: 820-2936 not charging battery
message:
Hi guys, i got a Macbook 2936 that was worked on before, covered in flux. The mac works fine from Charger, green light burning, but when the battery is connected it doesnt start when i connect the charger and no light. I can turn it on shorting SMC_ONOFF_L.  All voltages present when from AC, when battery is connected ACIN drops from 3.9 with Charger to 2.5 with battery connected, assuming it should still be 3.9v here. All resistors are OK (R7021/22, R7010/11, R7051/52, R5280/5281) and no short on any of the pins of U7000. Replaced U7000 just because I can, but the same. Also Q7030 had a weird looking IC on it so replaced that, still the same. Using original charger.

Any ideas how to tackle this?

Greetz
Arno

title: 820-2936 not charging battery
message: PPBUS voltage without battery? ACOK going low when battery connected? Known good battery?

title: 820-2936 not charging battery
message: Sorry customer didnt have time so took it back unrepaired. Thanks!
